ing: 4 fluid ounces hard lemonade (such as Mike's Hard LemonadeÂ®)
des: "The addition of lemon sorbet, fresh mint, and Mike's Hard LemonadeÂ® take this age-old classic up a notch. Garnish with additional mint sprig, if desired."
ins: Blend ice cubes, vodka, 2 ounces lemon sorbet, simple syrup, lemon juice, and mint together in a blender until smooth; pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Pour hard lemonade over vodka mixture and float remaining 1 ounce lemon sorbet on top.
